summary: The Plant Biostimulant Act of 2025 amends the Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act to define "plant biostimulants" and "nutritional chemicals." It clarifies what substances are excluded from the definition of a "plant regulator."  The bill also mandates the EPA to revise existing regulations related to plant biostimulants and requires the Secretary of Agriculture to conduct a study assessing the use of plant biostimulants to improve soil health and related environmental benefits.
